sections.title: Gray Corsair (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Gray Corsair class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Favored Port (Ex) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Grants bonuses to social skills, initiative, and Will saves while in chosen coastal settlements or aboard ships from those ports. Also provides free room and board in favored ports.

sections.title: Gray Focus (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Requires choosing a specific class focus that provides either automatic concentration checks for spellcasters or freedom from attacks of opportunity for non-spellcasters while on ships or swimming.

sections.title: Gray Boon (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Provides class feature progression based on the chosen gray focus, including spell progression for casters, bonus feats for martial classes, or enhanced class abilities for rogues and investigators.

sections.title: Know the Ropes (Ex) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Provides climbing bonuses when using ropes or rigging, including one-handed climbing, no accelerated climbing penalties, and immunity to falling from damage.

sections.title: Slaver Slayer (Ex) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Grants escalating attack and damage bonuses against slavers and slave owners, plus automatic critical hit confirmation against such targets.

sections.title: Breathe Easy (Sp) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Provides water breathing as a spell-like ability that can be used as a move or immediate action with varying ranges and durations.

sections.title: Grim Resolve (Ex) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Grants immunity to fear effects and adds Wisdom bonus to stabilization checks when dying.

sections.title: Grant Freedom (Sp) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Provides constant freedom of movement that can be transferred to others via touch as a swift action for a limited duration.

sections.title: Whisk to Freedom (Sp) (Gray Corsair)
sections.description: Grants wind walk and word of recall as daily spell-like abilities, with word of recall restricted to returning to Gray Corsair ships.
